dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.conditions.number
dt-option.summary: Set the condition names for the number column type

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.conditions.number` changes what will be displayed for the SearchBuilder's condition `-tag select` element for num, num-fmt, html-num and html-num-fmt conditions.

dt-option.description:
This object sets the text for the condition names in the condition `-tag select` element. The defaults for each language option is listed below.
* `between: 'Between'` * `null: 'Empty'` * `=: 'Equals'` * `>: 'Greater Than'` * `>=: 'Greater Than Equal To'` * `<: 'Less Than'` * `<=: 'Less Than Equal To'` * `!=: 'Not'` * `!between: 'Not Between'` * `!null: 'Not Empty'`
